      • constraints

        public double[] constraints(boolean[] bitstringWindows)
        Returns:
        an array holding the constraint violations if 0 - no violation; anything > 0 is a violation these aren't wrapped into a total violation value here because some algorithms like to have separate constraint counts and we want to allow for possible future implementation of them.
